DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine Punctal Plug Delivery System safe effective control intraocular pressure patient ocular hypertension open-angle glaucoma .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Study Latanoprost Punctal Plug Delivery System ( L-PPDS ) Subjects With Ocular Hypertension Open Angle Glaucoma
DOC.criteria: Over 18 yr ocular hypertension openangle glaucoma Subjects bestcorrected visual acuity 20/100 better . Subjects wear contact lens . Uncontrolled medical condition Subjects require chronic topical artificial tear , lubricant , and/or require chronic topical medication . Subjects history chronic recurrent inflammatory eye disease .
